ILKMS includes a comprehensive repository including the ability to manage media. Each Application can also run independently from the full implementation ILKMS. ILKMS and applications within the suite are designed for customers to be able to install the suite on their own Azure. ILKMS is visually customer customizable. Hybrid implementations are available. ILKMS has been designed from the ground up to quickly add new functionality at low cost and also includes a comprehensive API. When someone leaves an organization, vast quantities of institutional knowledge are longer available. In addition, an organization’s employee or member knowledge lies unused and unappreciated. Using the wisdom of the crowd, NanoWisdom helps organizations to recognize, curate, surface, and magnify knowledge that is valuable to the organization. NanoWisdom provides a business-driven approach to take advantage of unstructured, informal knowledge and integrate it into the primary goals of the organization. NanoWisdom is tightly integrated into Microsoft Teams and includes QuickNotion a Browser Extension further extending NanoWisdom capabilities. NanoWisdom is also available as a service managed by Intralearn Software. Detailed information is available on the NanoWisdom website. NanoLearn uses microlearning techniques to build and deploy short duration learning, minimizing the complexity of traditional eLearning courses to help organize and validate knowledge. NanoLearn can optionally be deployed with a minimized interface to further simplify the user experience, which is especially important for tablet and mobile devices. Content can come from or served directly from a variety of sources such as SCORM Content, the Web, Microsoft Teams, OneDrive, and other external sources. It also offers the ability to mine valuable metrics that highlight the impact on organizational performance. Founded in 1994, Intralearn Software is a leading global provider and pioneer of applications for the rapid creation, delivery and measurement of knowledge. Our newest ground-breaking offering is Intralearn Knowledge Management Suite. ILMS is available as a packaged Azure Cloud suite. Ideally ILKMS is published to a customer managed Azure Cloud. NanoNotion, is the first application that can be published independent from ILKMS and integrates on the fly with ILKMS. Intralearn Software © 2026 - All rights reserved Search Search for: Go to top
